title: 2015 All-Star Event Survival Guide
body: The NA LCS Studio is located at 12312 W Olympic Blvd, Los Angeles, CA 90064.

replies.body: Will there actually be decent fan interaction with the players/on-air staff this time? MSI was an absolute trainwreck for that type of stuff.
There definitely will be! All-Star is a smaller show in terms of audience, and pros don't have to be quite as worried about being rested for their following day's performances.
Do i have to get a copy of my tickets? are the QR codes on the Eventbrite app acceptable?

What patch will it be played at ? 

tell me 5.24 and it'll throw some pros off guard
What if I'm on the other side of the country?
You guys could put up a fountain there and I can get ulted by {{champion:78}}
Do we know when the IP boosts for the regions will be going out? Is there a page or link that has the date on it? Or is it just the ambiguous "start of S6" whenever that may be.
Hello b o y s help me with a little rp to buy a icon.Thank you :D
How much is parking at 12200 West Olympic Boulevard Saturday/Sunday? Or is it just limited parking?
You can get your parking validated by Riot Staff when you enter, it should be free. Enjoy!
I have a number of friends who were thinking about cosplaying at this event, but I see nothing listed concerning them.  Will they be allowed to cosplay at the show?
Will there be fan interactions if we come early?
will we be able to take pictures with players like during lcs?

Yes you will. However, it will be a pain to get a picture with huni or faker due to their popularity and the line to get a picture will be long. Despite that you will have a chance to get photos and autographs after matches.
